msg.msgText: The authenticity of host "{0}" cannot be established. {4} key fingerprint is {1}. Do you want to continue? (Enter "{2}" for yes and "{3}" for no)

msgExplanation.p: Automatic log transfer is being set up with an unknown host. A user response is necessary to confirm the identity of the host.

msgUserResponse.p: Verify the host identity and enter corresponding response.
